channel.title: Aaron Lohmann
channel.description: A personal website of Aaron Lohmann. Statistician and economist.

item.title: QJE - PhD Reading Group
item.dc:creator: Carsten Brockhaus, Aaron Lohmann
item.description:
This reading group intends to discuss the current research in brought aspects of economics. It is designed from PhD students for PhD students. All PhD students in the field of economics are warmly invited. We discuss every two to three weeks one of the papers in the most recent issue of Quartely Journal of Economics. The scope of the reading group is intentionally brought to allow us doctoral students a brought understanding of economics instead of focusing narrowly on our own research topics.

Schedule

Date Topic
01.06.2023 - 4 pm (Central European Time) Web of Power: How Elite Networks Shaped War and Politics in China - Ying Bai, Ruixue Jia, Jiaojiao Yang
